node.title: Then the End Will Come
node.description: In Matthew 24:14 Jesus predicts – and promises! – that when His gospel has been taken to the ends of the earth, the end will come! Jesus’ promise still stands – but is His church as fervent about fulfilling their part as were the early disciples? In this message Pastor Clark explores this promise – and the power behind it – and shares inspiring testimony of God’s working in the past.
